title: Comic Zone
description: This is a 'Comic Zone' website. When a user searches for a comic, it makes an API call and shows the comic content. It uses the Marvel API to get the data.

title: eCommerce
description: This is an eCommerce website built using ReactJS, Express, and MongoDB. It is hosted for free, so initial loading may take a little time, but all features work perfectly.
